.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IModelRuntimeInitializer

summary.para: Initializes a with the runtime dependencies. This is typically implemented by database providers to ensure that any runtime dependencies specific to their database are used.
This interface is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .
See Implementation of database providers and extensions for more information and examples.
